definitions: a small carnivorous plant of boggy places, with rosettes of leaves that bear sticky glandular hairs. These trap insects, which are then digested.

notes.text: Genus Drosera, family Droseraceae: many species, including the common European D. rotundifolia

shortDefinitions: small carnivorous plant of boggy places, with rosettes of leaves that bear sticky glandular hairs for trapping insects, which are then digested
